comments:
I have installed AJDT plugin on an Eclipse 3M7 and when I create a new 
aspect , I cant save it.

the message: 
----
Save
Failed:org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.AbstractTextEditor.createSaveOperation(Z)Lo
----
the message is truncated at the "(Z)Lo" part.
I have tried to find some help but I havent find out anything.

I forgot the log. Here it is.

AJDT 1.1.4 supports Eclipse only until version 3M4.
For working with Eclipse 3M8, try using AJDT 1.1.7 (available soon) or the 
current Developer Build.
Eclipse versions between 3M4 and 3M8 are not supported.

Sorry, mistake in previous posting: the current Developer Build (1.1.6) does 
not work with 3M8.

AJDT 1.1.7 has been released which works on Eclipse 3.0M8 and the AJDT 
download page on the website has been updated to correctly reflect which AJDT 
versions work with which Eclipse versions.
Now works with 1.1.7 on M8, see Andy's last comment.
